Package com.estore.api.estoreapi.persistence

Class ProductFileDAO

java.lang.Object
com.estore.api.estoreapi.persistence.ProductFileDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductDAO
@Component public class ProductFileDAO extends Object implements ProductDAO
Implements the functionality for JSON file-based peristance for Products (ProductDAO) @Component Spring annotation instantiates a single instance of this class and injects the instance into other classes as needed

    • ProductFileDAO

      public ProductFileDAO(@Value("${heroes.file}") String filename, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper) throws IOException
      Creates a Product File Data Access Object
      Parameters:
      filename - Filename to read from and write to
      objectMapper - Provides JSON Object to/from Java Object serialization and deserialization
      Throws:
      IOException - when file cannot be accessed or read from

    • getProductArray

      private Product[] getProductArray(String containsText)
      Generates an array of products from the tree map for any products that contains the text specified by containsText
      If containsText is null, the array contains all of the products in the tree map
      Returns:
      The array of products, may be empty

    • save

      private boolean save() throws IOException
      Saves the products from the map into the file as an array of JSON objects
      Returns:
      true if the products were written successfully
      Throws:
      IOException - when file cannot be accessed or written to

    • load

      private boolean load() throws IOException
      Loads products from the JSON file into the map
      Also sets next id to one more than the greatest id found in the file
      Returns:
      true if the file was read successfully
      Throws:
      IOException - when file cannot be accessed or read from
